meanings.definition: A South Asian condiment made with yogurt and various seasonings.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat raitas with my spicy curry.
meanings.sent2: In India, raitas are commonly served as a side dish.
meanings.sent3: The raitas danced on my taste buds, making my meal delightful.
meanings.sent4: The coolness of the raitas amidst the fiery spices was a refreshing contrast.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of the raitas blended perfectly with the spicy flavors.

meanings.definition: A dish consisting of vegetables or fruits mixed with yogurt and spices.
meanings.sent1: My mom makes the best raitas with cucumbers and mint.
meanings.sent2: During summer, I enjoy a refreshing bowl of raitas.
meanings.sent3: The colorful raitas looked like a vibrant painting on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The sweetness of the fruits in the raitas balanced the tanginess of the yogurt.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the spices in the raitas filled the kitchen with a delightful fragrance.
